title: Help make the Typecon Flickr Pool better!
content:
Help make the [Typecon Flickr Pool](http://web.archive.org/web/20080512042427/http:/www.flickr.com/groups/85628044@N00/) better!

- Add notes,  
- identify Who is in the photo -  
- and to add Tags

Thanks!

 [‹ 25 Great Typographic Title Sequences](http://web.archive.org/web/20080512042427/http:/www.typophile.com/node/35877 "Go to previous forum topic") [Mac rendering on Windows ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080512042427/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34393 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Eben Sorkin

comments.content: I’ve added a link to Eben’s post.

Excellent! Nice pictures and so good to put a name to faces.  
Sharon
